list.en: Are there any advantages to study in Europe?
list.cn: 在欧洲学习有什么优势吗?

list.en: Is this test hard?
list.cn: 这个考试难吗?

list.en: I want to study abroad. What should I do?
list.cn: 我想出国留学。我该怎么办?

list.en: Did you get the information about that school?
list.cn: 你得到那所学校的信息了吗?

list.en: Do international students need language level certificate?
list.cn: 国际学生需要语言水平证书吗?

list.en: How can I get into a strip?
list.cn: 我怎么才能进入脱衣舞?

list.en: How can I get into an Australian university?
list.cn: 我怎样才能进入澳大利亚的大学?

list.en: Do I have to take any tests?
list.cn: 我需要参加什么考试吗?

list.en: Can you suggest which country I should go?
list.cn: 你能建议我去哪个国家吗?

list.en: Why do you want to study in the USA?
list.cn: 你为什么想去美国学习?

list.en: Do you have any services for overseas students?
list.cn: 你们有针对留学生的服务吗?

list.en: Have you decided which university you are going to apply for?
list.cn: 你决定申请哪所大学了吗?

list.en: How many universities have you applied for?
list.cn: 你申请了几所大学?

list.en: I would recommend that you apply for a Harvard university.
list.cn: 我建议你申请哈佛大学。

list.en: Harvard university is competitive in business management.
list.cn: 哈佛大学在商业管理方面很有竞争力。

list.en: Princeton university is my first choice.
list.cn: 普林斯顿大学是我的第一选择。

list.en: My grades didn't reach the fractional line of Boston university.
list.cn: 我的成绩没有达到波士顿大学的分数线。

list.en: I believe I can achieve my dream at Columbia university.
list.cn: 我相信我能在哥伦比亚大学实现我的梦想。

list.en: What materials do you need for application?
list.cn: 申请需要什么材料?

list.en: You should pay the application fee before you apply for the school.
list.cn: 你应该在申请学校之前缴纳申请费。

list.en: I had to send my bank statement in support of my claim to the school.
list.cn: 我必须把我的银行对账单寄给学校，以证明我对学校的要求。

list.en: What about your tle?
list.cn: 你的名字怎么样?

list.en: I'm so lucky to pass the exam.
list.cn: 我很幸运通过了考试。

list.en: When will the result of the tele come out?
list.cn: 选举结果什么时候出来?

list.en: I got 105 in tle.
list.cn: 我得了105分。

list.en: If you want to apply for better universities, your score must be high.
list.cn: 如果你想申请更好的大学，你的分数必须高。

list.en: I plan to take the tle.
list.cn: 我打算拿这个头衔。

list.en: My tough score is not good, so what should I do?
list.cn: 我的高考成绩不好，我该怎么办?

list.en: Do all universities require the tle?
list.cn: 所有的大学都要求这个头衔吗?

list.en: I'm eating up the Co and tle.
list.cn: 我要把玉米饼吃光了。

list.en: I have been waiting for my university admission notice.
list.cn: 我一直在等我的大学录取通知书。

list.en: I have received Yale university's admission notice.
list.cn: 我已经收到了耶鲁大学的录取通知书。

list.en: Yale university has sent me an acceptance letter.
list.cn: 耶鲁大学给我寄来了录取通知书。

list.en: I have been in the ideal university.
list.cn: 我一直在理想的大学。

list.en: He did not wait for the long awaited university admission notice.
list.cn: 他没有等到期待已久的大学录取通知书。

list.en: Waiting for admission to the university is full of tension and expectation.
list.cn: 等待大学录取充满了紧张和期待。

list.en: I wish you could have passed the examination.
list.cn: 我希望你能通过考试。

list.en: I have been accepted e, at Columbia business school.
list.cn: 我被哥伦比亚大学商学院录取了。

list.en: I sent the good news to her family as soon as she got her letter of admission.
list.cn: 她一拿到录取通知书，我就把这个好消息通知了她的家人。

list.en: I just received the acceptance notification from the university I had applied for.
list.cn: 我刚刚收到我所申请的大学的录取通知。

list.en: I'm accepted by Yale university accidentally, which makes the whole family very excited.
list.cn: 我偶然被耶鲁大学录取了，这让全家人都很兴奋。

list.en: Do you think I can get a Visa?
list.cn: 你觉得我能办Visa卡吗?

list.en: Do you know how to apply for the student Visa?
list.cn: 你知道如何申请学生签证吗?

list.en: Have you ever been denied a Visa before?
list.cn: 你以前被拒签过吗?

list.en: How was your interview at the embassy yesterday?
list.cn: 你昨天在大使馆的面试怎么样?

list.en: Do I need a passport to study abroad?
list.cn: 出国留学需要护照吗?

list.en: I have an interview with the Visa officer tomorrow morning.
list.cn: 明天上午我要和签证官面谈。

list.en: I can help you prepare for the Visa interview if you want.
list.cn: 如果你需要，我可以帮你准备签证面试。

list.en: I'll try my best to answer.
list.cn: 我会尽力回答的。

list.en: I got the scholarship again.
list.cn: 我又拿到了奖学金。

list.en: Can you tell me something about your school scholarship system?
list.cn: 你能给我介绍一下你们学校的奖学金制度吗?

list.en: Have you got any scholarship during the period of school?
list.cn: 你在校期间获得过奖学金吗?

list.en: I just missed the opportunity to get the scholarship.
list.cn: 我刚刚错过了获得奖学金的机会。

list.en: This scholarship is very important to me.
list.cn: 这个奖学金对我来说很重要。

list.en: Congratulations to you for winning the scholarship again.
list.cn: 祝贺你再次获得奖学金。

list.en: Do you offer scholarships to international students?
list.cn: 你们向国际学生提供奖学金吗?

list.en: May I apply for full scholarship?
list.cn: 我可以申请全额奖学金吗?

list.en: This is my scholarship application form.
list.cn: 这是我的奖学金申请表。

list.en: Could you tell me the procedure of applying for a scholarship?
list.cn: 你能告诉我申请奖学金的程序吗?

list.en: Congratulations on graduating.
list.cn: 祝贺你毕业。

list.en: What a nice feeling to get my degree.
list.cn: 拿到学位的感觉真好。

list.en: Where can I get my gown and cap?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以拿到我的学位服和学位帽?

list.en: We throw our hats in the air.
list.cn: 我们把帽子抛向空中。

list.en: The graduation ceremony will be held tomorrow.
list.cn: 明天将举行毕业典礼。

list.en: I received a certificate.
list.cn: 我获得了证书。

list.en: I want to travel around the world after graduation.
list.cn: 毕业后我想环游世界。

list.en: Let's put our memories into the capsule.
list.cn: 让我们把回忆放进胶囊里。

list.en: This must be a proud day for you.
list.cn: 今天一定是你值得骄傲的一天。

list.en: Let's plan an after graduation trip.
list.cn: 让我们计划一次毕业后的旅行吧。

list.en: The commencement was held in the grand hall.
list.cn: 毕业典礼在大礼堂举行。

list.en: I'd like to invite you to attend our graduation ceremony.
list.cn: 我想邀请你来参加我们的毕业典礼。

list.en: When are you leaving for America?
list.cn: 你什么时候动身去美国?

list.en: If I were you, I would choose to study further and get a master's degree.
list.cn: 如果我是你，我会选择继续深造，拿到硕士学位。

list.en: I'll pursue further study.
list.cn: 我将继续深造。

list.en: I want to go abroad for further study.
list.cn: 我想出国深造。

list.en: To study abroad is my goal.
list.cn: 出国留学是我的目标。

list.en: After graduation from college, I hope to go for higher education overseas.
list.cn: 大学毕业后，我希望去国外接受高等教育。

list.en: Are you starting your doctorate?
list.cn: 你开始攻读博士学位了吗?

list.en: I'm going to Harvard university to do postgraduate work in medicine.
list.cn: 我要去哈佛大学读医学研究生。

list.en: Will you go for further study in the USA?
list.cn: 你会去美国深造吗?

list.en: I'm planning to do some further study abroad.
list.cn: 我打算出国深造。
